summary: sequence independent methods combined with next generation sequencing can identify viruses that would have remained unidentified in standard diagnostics or cell cultures. a simplified VIDISCA protocol can efficiently identify unrecognized viruses grown in cell culture with low cost, limited time without need of advanced technical expertise. electronic supplementary material 12985_2014_2473_MOESM1_ESM.doc (37KB, doc) Additional file 1: Table S1: An overview of the adaptations in the VIDISCA protocol.
